traits.Keen Smell: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
traits.Pounce: If the tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14+1d4 + 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.
